title: Something Needs to be done about OCE Tribunal
body: Could we please get someone from Riot on here to please explain why nothing is being done about this issue, constantly I'll be in my series on my other account, and just last game had 2 AFKs and proceeded to lose, I have no faith that there will be any repercussions to these people besides a mild LP slap on the wrist, will someone please explain this to me, because I am totally at a loss (pun intended)

replies.body:
Hey SovietOrangatang,

I'm sorry you've had to go through some negative games. Don't think that just because there isn't a tribunal that nothing is being done!

Right now we have multiple automatic systems in place to punish negative behaviour; for example

Live

**LeaverBuster** (this is the system that punishes afkers)
Chat restrictions
Intentional feeder bans
Manual audits
Currently testing

Automatic verbal abuse bans
This is of course just the negative stuff, we are also working on ways to promote and recognize positive play within our community as well!
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/celebrating-end-years-snowdown

Our player behavior philosophies include punishment, reform, and positive reinforcement. There's no silver bullet to improving player behavior in online games, and you always need a mix of punishments and rewards. You can read more about our design philosophies here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/exploring-player-behavior-design-values

If you're really interested in player behaviour give this video a watch it is Jeffrey "Lyte" Lin talking about "The Science Behind Shaping Player Behavior in Online Games".
http://gdcvault.com/play/1017940/The-Science-Behind-Shaping-Player
You can toot your own horn as much as you want, but you know it's not good enough... If it was good enough, why don't you get rid of the tribunal in the other regions? -__-
No region has the tribunal up right now. It is currently down in all regions being upgraded! All regions use a combination of automatic systems and manual audits currently.

Riot Maraudaur, thanks for responding to the post, and I understand that OCE might not be one of the biggest regions in the league, but that does not mean we have less fun or get less frustrated when things go well or when things go poorly, playing from season 2-3 I can tell you from personal experience that the community has definitely taken a turn for the worse when it comes to flaming and feeding. Can you tell us that there is ANY improvements being made in OUR region? just so that I might have some hope for the future because to be perfectly honest, it's getting more and more difficult to enjoy the game to the point where uninstalling is becoming a serious option.

Well i've just played a ranked game which had the following player: http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/76274693/200094855?tab=overview

Irelia was muted post champion select after basically stating that he was "god" and that we should "obey" him. Noone said anything in response. After roughly 5 minutes, he proceeded to run down middle to die and die again. The general idea that I collected by reading the chat logs of other team members is that since we didn't immediately gank his lane early and often, we didn't obey god and thus we will be punished.

We need a tribunal. 

I am disgusted by this behaviour and this is becoming more and more frequent.

Did they rage quit? Or did they disconnect due to a bugs plat/ firewall error that is becoming increasingly common. With the new leaver buster system they can be put into low priority ques and get ranked restrictions. There is no tribunal for any server atm, and even then, AFK doesn't actually go through the tribunal.

First change the law of Australia.

Then we can talk Tribunal.
